https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheat.title: DotNet Security - OWASP Cheat Sheet Series
https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheat.info: Comprehensive overview of OWASP secure coding practices for .NET applications including input validation, authentication, and session management

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/.title: Auditing package dependencies for security vulnerabilities
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/.info: Microsoft official documentation on auditing NuGet packages for security vulnerabilities and implementing security audits

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/traini.title: Guide to Secure .NET Development with OWASP Top 10
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/traini.info: Comprehensive overview of C# and .NET security vulnerabilities, input validation, SQL injection, XSS, and secure coding practices with code examples

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/.title: Best practices for a secure software supply chain
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/.info: Best practices for securing software supply chain in .NET/NuGet projects including dependency vulnerability scanning

https://secureframe.com/blog/soc-2-vs-is.title: SOC 2 vs ISO 27001: What's the Difference and Which Standard Do You Need
https://secureframe.com/blog/soc-2-vs-is.info: Comparison between SOC 2 and ISO 27001 compliance standards and their differences in scope and requirements

https://medium.com/@nikolaysmorchkov/man.title: Managing Risks When Using Third-Party Dependencies in Commercial Projects
https://medium.com/@nikolaysmorchkov/man.info: Detailed guidance on third-party dependency security risk assessment, evaluation criteria, and security management practices

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet.title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) support in ASP.NET Core
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet.info: Best practices for GDPR compliance in ASP.NET Core applications including data protection, privacy controls, and consent management

https://www.reddit.com/r/dotnet/comments.title: SAST Tools for .NET: Community Insights and Experiences
https://www.reddit.com/r/dotnet/comments.info: Static application security testing (SAST) tools for .NET including tools comparison, integration capabilities, and security analysis features

https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/article/be.title: Best Practices for Maintaining Security and Preventing Vulnerabilities in C#
https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/article/be.info: Best practices for C# input validation, buffer overflow prevention, and secure data handling techniques

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl.title: TiXL (Tooll 3) - Main Repository
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl.info: Primary codebase for TiXL real-time motion graphics software written in C#. Contains 4k+ stars, 230 forks, features node-based procedural content generation with DirectX 12 integration

https://tixl.app/.title: TiXL Official Website
https://tixl.app/.info: Official documentation and feature overview of TiXL platform for VJing, live performances, and motion graphics. Details real-time capabilities and system architecture

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/window.title: Memory Management in Direct3D 12
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/window.info: Comprehensive guide to DirectX 12 memory management strategies, heap suballocation, and synchronization considerations for optimal performance

https://docs.yworks.com/yfiles-html/dgui.title: Large Graph Performance
https://docs.yworks.com/yfiles-html/dgui.info: Technical documentation on performance optimization techniques for node-based editors handling thousands of elements with thousands of nodes

https://juce.com/posts/real-time-program.title: Real-time programming in audio development
https://juce.com/posts/real-time-program.info: Best practices for real-time audio processing, memory management, and synchronization requirements for audio-reactive applications

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl.title: TiXL Main Repository
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl.info: Main repository with 4k stars, 33 contributors, comprehensive release notes, MIT license. Language: C# (90.8%), HLSL (9.2%)

https://tixl.app.title: TiXL Official Homepage
https://tixl.app.info: Project overview, features list, contact information, free software emphasis, privacy-focused approach with no tracking

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/wiki.title: TiXL Wiki Documentation
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/wiki.info: Comprehensive documentation structure with User Guide, Developer Guide, API documentation, but content loading issues preventing full access to detailed content

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/wiki/help.title: TiXL Installation Guide
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/wiki/help.info: Detailed installation instructions for Windows, with mentions of Linux/Mac OS support through wrappers. Clear system requirements and troubleshooting guidance

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/releases.title: TiXL Release History
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/releases.info: Comprehensive release notes with regular updates, documentation improvements mentioned ('Almost all operators now have documentation'), and extensive feature descriptions

https://github.com/tixl3d.title: TiXL GitHub Organization
https://github.com/tixl3d.info: 5 repositories total: main tixl (4k stars), homepage, Resources (HLSL), Operators (C#), and tixl-homapage (0 stars)

https://www.resolume.com/forum/viewtopic.title: TiXL Community Recommendation Discussion
https://www.resolume.com/forum/viewtopic.info: Positive community feedback from Resolume forum: TiXL 4.0 described as 'absolute must-have' for motion graphics artists, indicating strong product value

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/issues.title: TiXL GitHub Issues Related to Documentation
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/issues.info: Critical issues found: 'Cannot create a project' (onboarding blocker), 'Add documentation of special variables' (API documentation gap), 'Ops that should be renamed' (documentation clarity)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j95VZXGA.title: YouTube Tutorial Series
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j95VZXGA.info: Comprehensive video tutorial library including HLSL compute shader development, C# operator development, shader graphs, fragment shaders, and operator graphs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JesK2jtc.title: C# Operator Development Tutorial
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JesK2jtc.info: Detailed walkthrough video for C# operator development, providing deep technical documentation through video format

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.title: TiXL (Tooll 3) - Real-time Motion Graphics Software
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.info: Main repository providing comprehensive project structure, module organization, and codebase foundation for analysis

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.title: TiXL Core Module Architecture
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.info: Detailed analysis of core module structure including Animation, Audio, Compilation, DataTypes, IO, Model, Operator, Rendering, Resource, Stats, SystemUi, UserData, Utils, and Video subsystems

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.title: TiXL Operator System Plugin Architecture
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.info: Comprehensive analysis of plugin-based operator system with interface-driven design, slot mechanism, symbol/instance management, and extensibility patterns

https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.title: TiXL Editor and UI Framework
https://github.com/tixl3d/tixl/tree/main.info: Analysis of UI framework patterns, component design, ImGui-based implementation, and user interface architecture using immediate-mode GUI principles

https://tixl.app.title: TiXL Official Project Website
https://tixl.app.info: Official project information, capabilities overview, and real-time motion graphics software specifications
